mapper.select: select purchase_id, purchase_no, purchase_number, purchase_time, receipt_time, product_no, product_name, supplier_no, supplier_name, account_number, user_name, receipt_status from purchase where purchase_id = #{purchaseId};;

select purchase_id, purchase_no, purchase_number, purchase_time, receipt_time, product_no, product_name, supplier_no, supplier_name, account_number, user_name, receipt_status from purchase order by receipt_status, purchase_time;
mapper.insert: insert into purchase (purchase_id, purchase_no, purchase_number, purchase_time, receipt_time, product_no, product_name, supplier_no, supplier_name, account_number, user_name, receipt_status) values (#{purchaseId}, #{purchaseNo}, #{purchaseNumber}, #{purchaseTime}, #{receiptTime}, #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{supplierNo}, #{supplierName}, #{accountNumber}, #{userName}, #{receiptStatus});
mapper.update:
update purchase
receipt_time = #{receiptTime},
receipt_status = #{receiptStatus},
where purchase_id=#{purchaseId};
